channel.title: Ip changing (not noob)
channel.description:
Basically, what I'm trying to do is make the client load the ip from a txt file. This is for an actually old client (MTP V2) and is only needed so I can connect to other servers without having to download the same client over and over.
Where it says server ip, I'm guessing I would put the directory to the text file?
